A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually impressive\, that's it... Otherwise\, suffers story-wise from various plot holes\, useless characters\, terrible character development\, inconsistent with established lore\, and most obvious intent to humiliate and ruin Luke Skywalker\, the enduring hero of the original trilogy.  Truly disappointing and hard to watch how an iconic hero is butchered to make way for the new characters\, just pitiful.  RIP Star Wars...
